channel.title: StockHedges
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from StockHedges, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Barclays shares hit nine-year high after third quarter profit jumps 23%, beating expectations
item.description: British bank Barclays on Thursday reported £1.6 billion ($2 billion) net profit attributable to shareholders for the third quarter, beating expectatio...

item.title: American Airlines lifts 2024 profit forecast after sales strategy shift, posts third-quarter loss
item.description: American Airlines raised its profit forecast for the year as CEO Robert Isom said the company's sales strategy shift earlier this year is paying off.

item.title: Industrial AI play Dover falls on a noisy quarter. Here's why we'd buy the dip
item.description: Shares of the industrial conglomerate fell more than 3% Thursday.

item.title: Southwest Airlines profit tops estimates, company expects higher revenue in fourth quarter
item.description: Southwest said travel demand remains healthy and it expects unit revenue for the fourth quarter to grow 3.5% to 5.5%.

item.title: Tesla shares jump on profit beat, Musk's prediction of at least 20% 'vehicle growth' next year
item.description: Tesla reported better-than-expected profit in its third-quarter earnings report on Wednesday.

item.title: Crude Futures Turn Lower in Indecisive Trade
item.description: Crude futures gave up early gains as the market remains indecisive weighing Middle East risk premium against demand concerns.

item.title: U.S. Stocks Mixed; Tesla Jumps on Earnings
item.description: U.S. stocks were mixed, with Tesla’s surprisingly strong results bolstering the tech-focused Nasdaq. The Nasdaq and S&P 500 gained, while the Dow indu...

item.title: A More Profitable Tesla Is Still a Pricey Ride
item.description: A surprise lift in automotive margins reversed the damage from the Robotaxi fallout, but its valuation is now far above even AI stars.

item.title: Dollar Eases as Fed Rate Cut Looks More Likely, Election Looms
item.description: The DXY dollar index fell, as the Fed looks more likely to cut rates in November and less likely to keep them unchanged, XTB said, adding that an uncl...

item.title: Solventum Taps Bankers to Explore Sale of Filtration Unit
item.description: The business is expected to attract takeover interest from strategic and private-equity buyers.
